rules_text:
Blockbuster 3 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap three untapped permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If this spell is a blockbuster, repeat this process once.
